variant.bodyText: Some of the tables that appeared in the article “Experiments on the Automatic In- duction of German Semantic Verb Classes” by Sabine Schulte im Walde (June 2006, Vol. 32, No. 2: 159–194) have potentially confusing column headers. The correctly for- matted tables are available on the web version of this article (http://mitpressjournals. org/toc/coli/32/2).

variant.note: Errata Some of the tables that appeared in the article “Experiments on the Automatic Induction of German Semantic Verb Classes” by Sabine Schulte im Walde (June 2006, Vol. 32, No. 2: 159–194) have potentially confusing column headers. The correctly formatted tables are available on the web version of this article (http://mitpressjournals. org/toc/coli/32/2). 2006 Association for Computational Linguistics
